name: James Ramos
description: What can I say, I am a “Leo”……….A widower 45 with one kid have been single since the death of my wife 5 yrs ago am in the us army. I am not into playing minds games and if you are, then please pass me by. I am a very caring, honest, kind, generous, thoughtful, sensitive, easy going, fun loving, intelligent, and lastly extremely compassionate and passionate man. I like making people laugh and can be very entertaining!!! in!!! I believe in romance…. I believe in holding hands in public… I believe in treating a women with respect, and am a very generous man…
